subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Verlander lost a bid for his third no-hitter when Chris Iannetta lined a double to lead off the ninth inning, but the Tigers beat the visiting Angels, 5-0.
snippet: Justin Verlander lost a bid for his third no-hitter when Chris Iannetta lined a double to lead off the ninth inning, but the Tigers beat the visiting Angels, 5-0.
